body_html:
I've put together a simple file using the native option Garoe@887678e
For installation without root access, the file needs to be copied to ~/.bash_completion.d/tensorboard and the following line . ~/.bash_completion.d/tensorboard has to be added to a ~/.bash_completion text file.
I'd be happy to add the steps in the install process and create a proper pull request, but I'd really appreciate some pointers into what files should be modified as I'm not familiar with Bazel.

body:
I've put together a simple file using the native option https://github.com/Garoe/tensorflow/commit/887678ef4ed1da04a13c272e5d5bb8d5fc2ac536
For installation without root access, the file needs to be copied to  `~/.bash_completion.d/tensorboard` and the following line `. ~/.bash_completion.d/tensorboard` has to be added to a `~/.bash_completion` text file.
I'd be happy to add the steps in the install process and create a proper pull request, but I'd really appreciate some pointers into what files should be modified as I'm not familiar with Bazel.
